reviewText: Another good film with outstanding cast of actors Charlton Heston, Ave Gardner,David Niven & Flora Robson who gave a very good performance. And I highly recommend.
LPCM Stereo audio. Little or no artifacts. Color is very vivid, good chroma and luminance. Minimal grain.

This Samuel Bronston epic, actually shot in Spain, is an historic but rousing entertainment!  The film transfer on the Blu-ray is so crisp and sharp, it almost looks as if it could have been shot yesterday in 4K! Highly recommended!
